txt.en: 'We've heard troubling reports of an unnatural disease afflicting the people and beasts of Kh没tra. Please, go to the village, investigate the disease and offer any aid you can.'
'You should speak to Roshat about the disease. He knows the most about it.'
Investigate the strange disease afflicting Kh没tra's beasts and inhabitants.
